sort.description:
Sorts the changelog by the commit message.
When empty, the order will match `git log`.

abbrev.description:
Shortens the commit hashes.
If set to -1, commit hashes will be excluded.

regexp.description: Regexp is matched against the first line of each commit.

divider.description: Divider that will be added between each group.

filters.description: Shows or hides commits. Each regexp is checked against the first commit message line only.

exclude.description: Regexp that will exclude matching commits from the changelog.

include.description: Regexp that will include matching commits to the changelog. If set, exclude will be ignored.
